tasks.title: Set up authentication middleware
tasks.description: Implement JWT-based authentication middleware that validates tokens on each incoming request.
acceptance_criteria: JWT tokens are validated on every protected endpoint
Expired tokens are rejected with a 401 response
Invalid signature tokens are rejected with a 401 response

tasks.title: Implement login endpoint
tasks.description: Create the POST /auth/login endpoint that accepts credentials and returns a signed JWT token.
acceptance_criteria: Endpoint returns a JWT token on valid credentials
Rate limiting is applied to prevent brute-force attacks

tasks.title: Implement logout and token revocation
tasks.description: Create the POST /auth/logout endpoint and token blacklist mechanism for immediate revocation.
acceptance_criteria: Logout invalidates the current token immediately
Revoked tokens are rejected even if not yet expired
Blacklist is persisted across server restarts
